entry.title: KVO - Key Value Observation
entry.content:
Use

{% codeblock lang:objective-c %} addObserver:forKeyPath:options:context: {% endcodeblock %}

to register an observer to the observed object.

Use {% codeblock lang:objective-c %} observeValueForKeyPath:ofObject:change:context: {% endcodeblock %}

to capture the fired, observing events.
